scripts.build: npm run build:landing && npm run build:searching && npm run build:sorting && npm run build:pathfinding && npm run copy
scripts.build:landing: cd landing && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:searching: cd searching && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:sorting: cd sorting && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:pathfinding: cd pathfinding && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public/searching public/sorting public/pathfinding && cp -r landing/dist/* public/ && cp -r searching/dist/* public/searching/ && cp -r sorting/dist/* public/sorting/ && cp -r pathfinding/dist/* public/pathfinding/
